settings.title: Hormone-Positive (ER+) on SERMs
settings.description: Your cancer was estrogen receptor-positive (ER+), and you’re currently taking SERMs (Tamoxifen). You want to support survivorship with nutrients that promote healthy cell function and overall wellness—while avoiding ingredients that may promote estrogen activity or are known to interfere with Tamoxifen.

settings.title: Hormone-Positive (ER+)
settings.description: Your cancer was estrogen receptor-positive (ER+), and you are either not taking hormone blockers or are taking AIs (e.g., Letrozole) or SERDs (e.g., Faslodex). You’re focused on supporting survivorship with nutrients that promote healthy cell function and overall wellness—while avoiding ingredients that may promote estrogen activity or interfere with your medication (Ai or SERD’s).

settings.title: Hormone-Negative (ER-)
settings.description: Your cancer was estrogen receptor-negative (ER-) or triple negative and you are no longer on chemotherapy or radiation therapy. You are looking to optimize your survivorship nutrients, help naturally balance your hormones, while promoting healthy cell function and overall wellness.

settings.heading: Which type of breast cancer did you survive?
settings.subheading: Your treatment was breast cancer specific—now your supplements can be too.
